# Srewart p.50
kw <- function(t = 273+37){
  return(8.754 * 10e-10 * exp(-1.01 * 10e6 / (t * t)))
}

pH <- function(h){
  return(-log10(h))
}

# calcul de la [h+]
eq_5A11 <- function(sid, akw = 4.3e-16, aka, atot){
  # set value par dÃ©faut de H-
  hi <- 1.0
  ho <- 4.4e-14
  crit <- 1e-6
  fh <- 1
  
  while((abs(fh) > crit){
    h <- sqrt(hi * ho)
    oh <- akw / h
    a <- aka * atot / (aka + h)
    fh <- sid + h -oh -a
    ifelse( h > 0, hi = h, lo = h)
  }

  return(h)
}
